ingredients: 2 eggs, 1/4 cup milk, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1 tablespoon butter
author: Chef Breakfast Lover
instructions:
1. In a bowl, beat the eggs with milk, salt, and pepper...
2. Heat butter in a non-stick skillet over medium-low heat...
3. Pour the egg mixture into the skillet and stir constantly until cooked to your liking...

ingredients: 1 cup oats, 1 cup milk, 1/2 banana, 1 tablespoon honey, 1/4 cup chopped nuts
author: HealthyEats123
instructions:
1. In a saucepan, combine oats and milk...
2. Mash the banana and add it to the oat mixture...
3. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the oats are tender and the mixture thickens...
4. Drizzle with honey and sprinkle with chopped nuts before serving.

ingredients: 2 slices of bread, 2 eggs, 2 slices of bacon, 1 slice of cheese, butter
author: BreakfastFanatic
instructions:
1. Cook the bacon in a skillet until crispy...
2. In the same skillet, fry the eggs to your preference...
3. Butter one side of each bread slice...
4. Assemble the sandwich with bacon, eggs, and cheese between the bread slices...
5. Toast the sandwich in a pan until the bread is golden and the cheese melts.

ingredients: 1 cup Greek yogurt, 1/2 cup granola, 1/2 cup mixed berries, 1 tablespoon honey
comments: A quick and healthy breakfast option!
author: YogurtLover
instructions:
1. In a glass or bowl, layer Greek yogurt, granola, and mixed berries...
2. Drizzle with honey...

ingredients: 2 slices of whole-grain toast, 1 avocado, 2 poached eggs, salt, pepper, red pepper flakes
comments: A trendy and nutritious breakfast choice!
author: AvocadoEnthusiast
instructions:
1. Toast the whole-grain bread slices...
2. Mash the avocado and spread it on the toasted bread...
3. Top each slice with a poached egg...
4. Season with salt, pepper, and a pinch of red pepper flakes to taste...
